snippet: The extra deployments appear to be intended to meet personnel requirements necessary to maintain bases across the country, including Kandahar Airfield.
abstract: United States military will keep up to 1,000 extra troops in Afghanistan through early 2015; decision appears to be intended to meet personnel requirements necessary to maintain bases across the country.
lead_paragraph: The extra deployments appear to be intended to meet personnel requirements necessary to maintain bases across the country, including Kandahar Airfield.

headline.main: 1,000 Extra U.S. Soldiers Will Remain in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: 1,000 Extra U.S. Soldiers Will Remain in Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
